item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Youâ€™re using selectoption, which I am unfamiliar with, but I believe, or it should be, rather, that both options are an individual case of their own. You have to make heightLevel -= 1 for the downstair option case, and += 1 for the upstair option case.

item.title: Case 1739 staris up down
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

hi im fixinf the staricase in lumb castle but why doenst this work?

ued this

placed in object click 1

case 1739: if (actionTimer == 0) { selectoption("climb up or down the stairs?", "Climb up the stairs.", "Climb down the stairs.", ""); OptionObject = objectID; } break;

placed in case 185 underneeth case 9157

else if(OptionObject == 1739) { heightLevel += 1; OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

placed in case 185 underneeth case 9158

else if(OptionObject == 1739) { //option one heightLevel -= 1; OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

why doesnt this work??
